description:
Your Injury Attorney In Ohio

If you were hurt on the job or in an accident caused by someone else's negligence, you need an attorney on your side dedicated to helping you secure the maximum amount possible for the damages you incurred.

At the law firm of Kisling Nestico & Redick LLC in Columbus, Ohio, our attorneys will advocate strongly on your behalf to protect your rights and interests while working hard to recover the compensation and benefits you need to support yourself and your family.

Skilled And Dedicated Counsel

Possessing an astounding 400 years of combined legal experience, the attorneys at our law firm have the skills and resources necessary to handle your case regardless of the complexities or challenges involved.

Throughout our history, we have secured over $450 million in settlements and awards for our clients, earning our reputation as one of the leading personal injury practices in Ohio and across the region.

Award-Winning Support

Our highly rated and award-winning attorneys will provide the personalized assistance and dedicated support you need during your difficult time, and we will remain by your side throughout any legal proceedings to ensure we help you obtain the justice you seek.

No Upfront Fees And Free Consultations

For efficient, effective representation from an attorney you can trust, look no further than Kisling Nestico & Redick LLC. Our law firm offers free initial consultations, and we will not charge a fee from you unless we successfully recover compensation on your behalf.
